DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study investigate cost-effectiveness four method prevent fissure caries permanent teeth , prevalent dental disease primary school child China . The four caries prevention method : resin fissure sealant , atraumatic restorative treatment ( ART ) sealant , sodium fluoride varnish , silver diamine fluoride ( SDF ) solution . The specific study objective : 1. describe longitudinally clinical outcome use four method prevent dental caries pit fissure permanent first molar school child , 2. describe cost use four method prevent dental caries outreaching dental care programme China , 3. compare cost-effectiveness four caries prevention method .
DOC.brief_title: Cost-effectiveness Four Methods Preventing Fissure Caries Permanent Teeth
